attributes.action: Make more rights and provide more help for people with dwarfism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this includes permantly deleting any film/T.V material that may offend people who suffer from restricted growth condition and for discrimination or offensive language made against people with dwarfism to be taken as a serious consequence. The use of words like 'midget' to be taken as an offence against people of short statue or short in general, taking job discrimnation against short people more seriously (this means if their height has reasoning to do with their refusal of application for employment etc
